keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
unmap d
unmap x
map d removeTab
unmap X
unmap u
map u restoreTab
map <c-d> scrollPageDown
map <c-u> scrollPageUp
unmap g$
map <a-,> firstTab
map <a-.> lastTab
map ' Marks.activateGotoMode
map <c-f> scrollFullPageDown
map <c-b> scrollFullPageUp
unmap t
map t Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
unmap b
map b Vomnibar.activateTabSelection


map R reload hard
unmap ^
map <c-o> visitPreviousTab
unmap yt
map D duplicateTab
map J nextTab
map K previousTab

# unmap unused defaults to reduce amount of lines in help menu
unmap gs
unmap zL
unmap zH
unmap gf
unmap gF
unmap B
unmap gT
unmap gt
# use alt-0
unmap g0
searchEngines:
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
yx: https://yandex.ru/search?text=%s Yandex
o: https://www.ozon.ru/search/?text=%s
